reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft and comfortable, with one noting it's not itchy like some other sweaters. They appreciate its perfect size, nice quality, and medium thickness, with one mentioning it's thick enough for cool weather. The color receives positive feedback, and customers like its style, with one noting it looks expensive.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute runs large
items.body: It’s very cute , but does run large it is soft and comfortable. Read more
items.author: CYDNEY

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Trendy Sweater
items.body: Love this sweater! The colors are great! Can dress it up or wear it with jeans and make it casual. I wear a cream/off white long sleeve shirt under it. It’s not too thick, so it doesn’t make you too hot. Good quality. Read more
items.author: Jennifer Oakley

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and very soft!
items.body: Not the highest quality in terms of the ties on the front, but it is adorable and very soft...Sizing is good and I will be keeping it! Read more
items.author: MimiLinda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and stylish
items.body: I was a little hesitant to jump on the “bow trend” but so glad I did! This sweater is soft, great quality, and the color is perfection. Such a cute fall sweater. I ordered my usual size and it fit perfect. Read more
items.author: patricia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and stylish
items.body: Definitely love this sweater! I’ve already styled it a few different way with different outfits and it’s been so cute and fun! Fits really well and a little oversized. The quality is good, soft, and it does keep me warm! Read more
items.author: Rose

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft & Pretty, But Style It Right for the Best Look
items.body: This ZESICA cardigan made a great first impression—the pale blue color with white trim and bow details is just as pretty as the photos, and the material is super soft to the touch. For a synthetic blend, it's surprisingly breathable and has a bit of stretch, which adds to the comfort. The medium fits true to size and has a good length, but the overall cut is a bit shapeless. It tends to hang straight without much structure, so it’s not the most flattering piece on its own. That said, it has a nice medium weight that makes it ideal for layering during the fall months—with jeans, scarves, or under a coat. The key to making this cardigan shine is what you wear underneath it. Pair it with a fitted tank, cami, or crisp blouse and it can look chic and intentional. It’s a pretty good quality piece and easy to care for—just be mindful of how you style it to get the most out of it. Read more
items.author: Heather F

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Would not recommend
items.body: Not a good fit. It was too long but also too snug. The front ties were too thick and the entire sweater was bulky. It was not flattering at all. The color was also different than depicted. It is more of a peach color, not a pink hue. This style is popular and I wanted a tie front cardigan but I will keep looking for one that looks nicer. Read more
items.author: dpm

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft
items.body: Very soft and cute. runs true to size. Read more
items.author: VL123

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Pink, White, Oats, Blue, Black, Camel, Caramel, Armygreen. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
